overview: The fantasies men have of a female fight club are not exaggerated, at least not according to Lesbian Fight Club. Here, the fight clubs have about as much to do about fighting as boiling does to baking. These girls may spar for a short time, but soon after they just get mesmerized by each other's body and start lickin' pussy!
tagline: Get ready to rumble with some hot sexy lesbians!
title: Lesbian Fight Club
